comments.body: Quote from: titokruzon21 on November 30, 2023, 10:43:40 AMneed some helpers for a week or two online tasks, $10 per day in btc, little work 30 minutes or less, mainly collecting temporary emails from tempmail and easy form filling, Telegram    @titokruzSince you are a newbie how can we trust you that after getting the work done , you may not pay at all. Nothing bad against you but either you put the money in escrow to someone trusted on this forum or pay the payment in advance in case you select the high rank members publicly on the forum.
